thread.title: The Travelers Insider: New Travel Blog
thread.title_full: The Travelers Insider: New Travel Blog

author: The Travelers Insider
title: The Travelers Insider: New Travel Blog
text: The Travelers Insider: By Email RSS Feeds: The Travelers Insider: New Travel Blog The California based travel blog, The Travelers Insider is owned and operated by seasoned travelers and former traveler consultants Sue Tripp and Cynthia Anchondo. They began the blog to share their love and knowledge of travel with others. Los Angeles, CA, August 28, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The Travelers Insider was started by Sue Tripp and Cynthia Anchondo, who met in the early 90’s while attending school to become travel agents. They quickly became friends sharing their passion for travel. They both shared a particular love for England and had traveled there many times. This later lead them to become Britain travel experts in their travel careers and they went on to travel to England several times together.After finishing school they went to work at Carlson Wagonlit Travel Agency. They loved working with people, regardless of their budget, to help them make their travel dreams come true. They soon began to have the reputations of going beyond the typical travel agent’s duties. They helped clients in the planning of their vacations and showing them how to save money, plan their itineraries and make the most of their time. Sue and Cynthia eventually moved into the consulting work. They have written for Yahoo Travel, wrote a travel guide and went on to start the online travel blog The Travel Insider so they could share their love and knowledge of travel with others.
